weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not a bird. I'm cold and wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🧊 I can turn into ice.

weather.question: I'm big and yellow and hot in the sky. I make you feel warm. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I shine bright during the day.
🕶️ You might need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I float in the sky. Sometimes I'm white and fluffy, sometimes I'm dark and gray. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like sheep.
🌧️ I can bring rain.
☁️ Birds fly around me.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance and the trees sway. You can fly a kite in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I am moving air.
🪁 You can feel me on your face.
💨 Sometimes I can be strong.

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You can make snowballs with me.
❄️ Each piece is unique.
⛄️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I appear after the rain, with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I am a colorful arc.
💧 I need sunshine and rain to appear.

weather.question: I'm a loud crash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright and fast.
⛈️ I often come with thunder.
🌩️ I am electricity in the sky.

weather.question: I come after lightning, and I'm a loud rumble in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I make a booming sound.
🌩️ I follow a flash of light.
👂 You can hear me from far away.

weather.question: I am like frozen rain, but I am small balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can bounce when I land.
⛈️ I usually happen during a thunderstorm
🚗 Be careful, because I can dent cars.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm with very strong winds, shaped like a funnel. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can lift things off the ground.
🏡 It is dangerous to be outside when I come.
🌀 I spin around really fast.

cosmos.question: I am big and yellow, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌼 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You wear sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and you live here. I have land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 We all live on me.
🌱 I am the only planet we know of with lots of life!
🌎 I am the third planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I come out at night and sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm not. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me!
🧀 People sometimes say I am made of cheese.
🌚 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, bigger than Earth. I have a big red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have many moons!
💨 I am made of gas, not rock.
🔴 I am the biggest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am very far away and twinkle at night. I am a ball of hot, glowing gas. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very, very hot!
🔭 You can see many of me on a clear night.
🌟 I look like a small point of light.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a very pretty planet.
💨 I am also a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and some people think there might be life on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Robots have explored me!
🔴 I am known as the 'Red Planet'.
🍫 I am smaller than Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
🌃 You can see me on a clear night with no moon!
✨ I have a name like The Big Dipper!

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am very, very big!
✨ I contain billions of stars.
🥛 My name is often associated with milk.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy object that sometimes has a bright tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am like a dirty snowball in space.
☀️ I get a tail when I fly close to the sun.
🧊 I am made up of ice, dust, and gas.
